content: That woman is by nature intended to obey is shown by the fact that every woman who is placed in the unnatural position of absolute independence at once attaches herself to some kind of man, by whom she is controlled and governed; this is because she requires a master. If she, is young, the man is a lover; if she is old, a priest.
translations: ita:Che la donna sia per natura destinata ad obbedire Ã¨ dimostrato dal fatto che ogni donna posta nella posizione innaturale
